description.value: For the spell's duration, your eyes become an inky void imbued with dread power. Target a creature within 60 feet with a gaze attack. They must make a Will saving throw or suffer one of the following effects for one minute: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}. You can perform a new gaze attack each round as part of the Sustain action.
